attention3.ptxt: For identification of each cylinder and bank, refer to Precaution for Identification of Cylinder and Bank:N32A .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P0132: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage Bank 1 Sensor 1

entry.ptxt: HO2S-1 (bank 1) signal voltage is higher than 1.2 V for 5 sec.

ptxt.emph: P0137: O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage Bank 1 Sensor 2

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at bank 2.

item.ptxt: HO2S-2 signal voltage is lower than 0.02 V for 40 sec. after warming up.
HO2S-2 signal voltage is lower than 0.02 V for 5 sec. at cold start.

ptxt.emph: P0138: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage Bank 1 Sensor 2

entry.ptxt: HO2S-2 (bank 1) signal voltage is higher than 1.2 V for 5 sec.

ptxt.emph: P0152: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage Bank 2 Sensor 1

entry.ptxt: HO2S-1 (bank 2) signal voltage is higher than 1.2 V for 5 sec.

ptxt.emph: P0157: O2 Sensor Circuit Low Voltage Bank 2 Sensor 2

entry.ptxt: This DTC is detected if any one of the following conditions is met at bank 2.

item.ptxt: HO2S-2 signal voltage is lower than 0.02 V for 40 sec. after warming up.
HO2S-2 signal voltage is lower than 0.02 V for 5 sec. at cold start.

ptxt.emph: P0158: O2 Sensor Circuit High Voltage Bank 2 Sensor 2

entry.ptxt: HO2S-2 (bank 2) signal voltage is higher than 1.2 V for 5 sec.

attention3.ptxt: Make sure that the following conditions are satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 60 – 80 km/h (37 – 50 mile/h) for 3 min. or more. (Keep throttle valve opening constant in this step.)
Run engine at idle speed for 3 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: Air intake system and exhaust system check

test1.ptxt: Check air intake system, exhaust system, vacuum hoses and PCV hoses for clogging or leakage.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

testgroup.title: HO2S signal circuit and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, disconnect connectors from HO2S related to DTC and ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to HO2S and ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check each HO2S circuit for the following.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each HO2S signal circuit (A3, B3, C3 or D3) and ground circuit (A4, B4, C4 or D4) is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance between HO2S signal circuit and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between HO2S signal terminal and other terminal at HO2S connector.
Circuit voltage of HO2S signal circuit and ground circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned ON.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: DTC recheck

test1.ptxt: Perform DTC confirmation procedure and check DTC.

testgroup.question: Is DTC P0132, P0137, P0138, P0152, P0157 or P0158 still detected?

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
